column1: # description = Data from The Atlas of Pidgin and Creole Structures Online (APICS), Structure dataset 32: Cape Verdean Creole of São Vicente, based on data compiled by Dominika Swolkien, Universidade de Cabo Verde.
# text = Na nha prinsip, koza k N gostá d'fazê senpr péska, senpr péska.
# translation = A thing I liked to do from the very beginning was always fishing, always fishing.
# text = Agóra, N te ben kontá ots koza tanbê fóra péska.
# translation = Now, I will also tell about other things, apart from fishing.
# text = Na prinsip, de nha trabói ke nos mai tá inximá-nos éra katá páia, katá bósta - bo sabê kze ke e bósta, bósta d'váka?
# translation = In the beginning of my work, what our mother used to teach us was picking up straw, manure - do you know what manure is, cow's manure?
# text = Tud es koza no tá fazê, katá, bá vendê na moráda.
# translation = Picking it up, going and selling it in the city, all these things we used to do.
# text = Má tontê k bosê tá vendê?
# translation = But for how much did you sell it?
# text = K manera k bo tá vendê?
# translation = How did we sell it?
# text = Éra fazid un montin na txon, dez toston kada montin, sin.
# translation = It was to make a little hill on the ground, ten toston each, yes.
# text = Y mas uke bosê táva fazê para alén de...
# translation = And what else were you doing apart from...
# text = Dpos enton N ben te kriá, N ben pô na vida d’már.
# translation = Later then I grew up and I entered the sea life.
# text = A bosê enton ka bá pa skóla, ne?
# translation = You didn’t go to school then, did you?
# text = Nau, N bá pa skóla, N tiv dos óne d'skola.
# translation = No, I went to school; I had two years of schooling.
# text = Kze k N fazê, N fazê so nha primera klás, fui so.
# translation = What I did was to complete only my first grade, it was only this.
# text = Y manera k e vida d’péska?
# translation = And how is the life of fishing?
# text = Vida d’péska na prinsip fui … éra grand koza, na prinsip.
# translation = At the beginning the life of fishing was a big thing, in the beginning.
# text = Agóra péska ka ta dá k pex … ta un bokód pok.
# translation = But nowadays fishing isn't lucrative because the fish are a little scarce.
# text = Má tud jent te dzê purke un ves tinha mas pex agó ten pok.
# translation = But everybody says that in past times there were a lot of fish and now there are few.
# text = Má modke, gó ten mas peskador?
# translation = But why, are there more fishermen now?
